update studentbehavior
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
year = #{record.year,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
term = #{record.term,jdbcType=INTEGER},
studentId = #{record.studentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
count_breakfast = #{record.countBreakfast,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mean_breakfast = #{record.meanBreakfast,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sum_breakfast = #{record.sumBreakfast,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mean_lunch = #{record.meanLunch,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sum_lunch = #{record.sumLunch,jdbcType=INTEGER},

year = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
term = #{term,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mean_lunch = #{meanLunch,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sum_lunch = #{sumLunch,jdbcType=INTEGER},
count_dinner = #{countDinner,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mean_dinner = #{meanDinner,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sum_dinner = #{sumDinner,jdbcType=INTEGER},

sum_meal = #{sumMeal,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sum_market = #{sumMarket,jdbcType=INTEGER},

consumptionLabel = #{consumptionLabel,jdbcType=INTEGER},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update studentbehavior set year = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, term = #{term,jdbcType=INTEGER}, studentId = #{studentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, count_breakfast = #{countBreakfast,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mean_breakfast = #{meanBreakfast,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sum_breakfast = #{sumBreakfast,jdbcType=INTEGER}, count_lunch = #{countLunch,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mean_lunch = #{meanLunch,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sum_lunch = #{sumLunch,jdbcType=INTEGER}, count_dinner = #{countDinner,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mean_dinner = #{meanDinner,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sum_dinner = #{sumDinner,jdbcType=INTEGER}, count_meal = #{countMeal,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sum_meal = #{sumMeal,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sum_market = #{sumMarket,jdbcType=INTEGER}, count_sleeplate = #{countSleeplate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, breakfastLabel = #{breakfastLabel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mealLabel = #{mealLabel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, consumptionLabel = #{consumptionLabel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sleeplateLabel = #{sleeplateLabel,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select year, count(if(breakfastLabel=0,true,null)) as breakfastLabel0, count(if(breakfastLabel=1,true,null)) as breakfastLabel1 from scoreanalysis.studentbehavior where year>=2015 group by year;

select ss.year, count(if(ss.breakfastLabel=0,true,null)) as breakfastLabel0, count(if(ss.breakfastLabel=1,true,null)) as breakfastLabel1 from scoreanalysis.studentbehavior ss , scoreanalysis.class c ,scoreanalysis.student s where s.classId=c.classId and s.studentId=ss.studentId and (c.collegeId=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or c.majorId=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) and ss.year>=2015 group by ss.year;
select count(if(breakfastLabel=0,true,null)) as breakfastLabel0, count(if(breakfastLabel=1,true,null)) as breakfastLabel1 from scoreanalysis.studentbehavior where year>=2015;

select count(if(ss.breakfastLabel=0,true,null)) as breakfastLabel0, count(if(ss.breakfastLabel=1,true,null)) as breakfastLabel1 from scoreanalysis.studentbehavior ss , scoreanalysis.class c ,scoreanalysis.student s where s.classId=c.classId and s.studentId=ss.studentId and (c.collegeId=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or c.majorId=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) and ss.year>=2015;

select year, count(if(consumptionLabel=0,true,null)) as consumptionLabel0, count(if(consumptionLabel=1,true,null)) as consumptionLabel1, count(if(consumptionLabel=2,true,null)) as consumptionLabel2, count(if(consumptionLabel=3,true,null)) as consumptionLabel3, count(if(consumptionLabel=4,true,null)) as consumptionLabel4 from scoreanalysis.studentbehavior where year>=2015 group by year;

select ss.year, count(if(ss.consumptionLabel=0,true,null)) as consumptionLabel0, count(if(ss.consumptionLabel=1,true,null)) as consumptionLabel1, count(if(ss.consumptionLabel=2,true,null)) as consumptionLabel2, count(if(ss.consumptionLabel=3,true,null)) as consumptionLabel3, count(if(ss.consumptionLabel=4,true,null)) as consumptionLabel4 from scoreanalysis.studentbehavior ss , scoreanalysis.class c ,scoreanalysis.student s where s.classId=c.classId and s.studentId=ss.studentId and (c.collegeId=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or c.majorId=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) and ss.year>=2015 group by ss.year;

select count(if(consumptionLabel=0,true,null)) as consumptionLabel0, count(if(consumptionLabel=1,true,null)) as consumptionLabel1, count(if(consumptionLabel=2,true,null)) as consumptionLabel2, count(if(consumptionLabel=3,true,null)) as consumptionLabel3, count(if(consumptionLabel=4,true,null)) as consumptionLabel4 from scoreanalysis.studentbehavior where year>=2015;

select count(if(ss.consumptionLabel=0,true,null)) as consumptionLabel0, count(if(ss.consumptionLabel=1,true,null)) as consumptionLabel1, count(if(ss.consumptionLabel=2,true,null)) as consumptionLabel2, count(if(ss.consumptionLabel=3,true,null)) as consumptionLabel3, count(if(ss.consumptionLabel=4,true,null)) as consumptionLabel4 from scoreanalysis.studentbehavior ss , scoreanalysis.class c ,scoreanalysis.student s where s.classId=c.classId and s.studentId=ss.studentId and (c.collegeId=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or c.majorId=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) and ss.year>=2015;

select year, count(if(mealLabel=0,true,null)) as mealLabel0, count(if(mealLabel=1,true,null)) as mealLabel1, count(if(mealLabel=2,true,null)) as mealLabel2 from scoreanalysis.studentbehavior where year>=2015 group by year;

select ss.year, count(if(ss.mealLabel=0,true,null)) as mealLabel0, count(if(ss.mealLabel=1,true,null)) as mealLabel1, count(if(ss.mealLabel=2,true,null)) as mealLabel2 from scoreanalysis.studentbehavior ss , scoreanalysis.class c ,scoreanalysis.student s where s.classId=c.classId and s.studentId=ss.studentId and (c.collegeId=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or c.majorId=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) and ss.year>=2015 group by ss.year;

select count(if(mealLabel=0,true,null)) as mealLabel0, count(if(mealLabel=1,true,null)) as mealLabel1, count(if(mealLabel=2,true,null)) as mealLabel2 from scoreanalysis.studentbehavior where year>=2015;

select year, count(if(sleeplateLabel=0,true,null)) as sleeplateLabel0, count(if(sleeplateLabel=1,true,null)) as sleeplateLabel1 from scoreanalysis.studentbehavior where year>=2015 group by year;

select ss.year, count(if(ss.sleeplateLabel=0,true,null)) as sleeplateLabel0, count(if(ss.sleeplateLabel=1,true,null)) as sleeplateLabel1 from scoreanalysis.studentbehavior ss , scoreanalysis.class c ,scoreanalysis.student s where s.classId=c.classId and s.studentId=ss.studentId and (c.collegeId=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or c.majorId=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) and ss.year>=2015 group by ss.year;
select count(if(sleeplateLabel=0,true,null)) as sleeplateLabel0, count(if(sleeplateLabel=1,true,null)) as sleeplateLabel1 from scoreanalysis.studentbehavior where year>=2015;

select count(if(ss.sleeplateLabel=0,true,null)) as sleeplateLabel0, count(if(ss.sleeplateLabel=1,true,null)) as sleeplateLabel1 from scoreanalysis.studentbehavior ss , scoreanalysis.class c ,scoreanalysis.student s where s.classId=c.classId and s.studentId=ss.studentId and (c.collegeId=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or c.majorId=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) and ss.year>=2015;
select * from scoreanalysis.studentbehavior where studentId=#{studentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR};
